newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares seen falling on Handlowy offering.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares seen falling on Handlowy offering.

text.p: Polish shares are expected to extend a two-session fall on Thursday as investors were shifting funds to the primary market or taking quick profits after earlier brief rally.

Analysts said the bourse was likely to be under the biggest pressure from one-billion zloty Bank Handlowy public offer on Thursday and Friday when the first period of the retail subscription offering biggest discounts, ends.
Construction and trading firm Atlantis SA starts bourse trade on the main market, after it was suspended on its debut on Wednesday. -- Malgorzata Rzepka +48 22 653 9700
